DOC.brief_summary: To establish bioequivalence ( BE ) feed condition metformin linagliptin/metformin fix dose combination tablet metformin reference product administer free combination togther linagliptin
DOC.brief_title: Bioequivalence Metformin Under Fed Conditions After Administration Linagliptin / Metformin Fixed Dose Combination Tablet Single Tablets
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : 1 . Healthy male female subject Exclusion criterion : 1 . Any relevant deviation healthy condition
